register.errorEmail: There is already an account in this email address.
register.errorUsername: There is already an account in this username

usernameErrors.specialCharacter: You cannot use special characters and numbers.

passwordErrors.uppercase: Password must be contain at least one uppercase character
passwordErrors.lowercase: Password must be contain at least one lowercase character
passwordErrors.number: Password must be contain at least one number

register.alertMessage: Sign up is success.Please check your email and verify your account. You will redirect Login page after 5 seconds...

category.clicktoreadAll: Click to see my all articles...

article.commentwarning: *You have to prove not bot, please fill the checkbox after that you can send your comment.
article.commentDeleteQuestion: Do you want to delete this comment ?
article.commentDeleteInfo: The selected comment will be completely destroyed. This action cannot be undone. If your comment contains useful information, it can be a resource for future generations!
article.cookies: We use cookies to serve you better. To see what type of cookies these are, you can click  and see it securely.

search.title: Is there a topic you want to search?
search.placeholder: Type the word you want to search
search.found: Searches found in the word {{searchWord}} A total of {{maxResult}} results are listed.
search.notfound: Sorry, No results found for word {{searchWord}} .

modal.reason1: There is inappropriate image or text.
modal.explain: Please explain why you are reporting this profile?

settings.hidden: I do not want it to appear.

forgotpassword.info: Please fill in the field below to send a password reset link to your registered email address.

linkedin.error: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.

github.error: Unknown error occurred. Please try again.

500.explain: There was a problem with our server. We are trying to figure out what this problem is. If you have received this error during your current job, you can let us know. We will try to solve it as soon as possible.
500.explainErr: Briefly explain how you got the error.
500.explainErr2: We need to know this to better understand how you encountered the error you received.
500.noValue: No value can be entered in this field.

404.explain: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. You may have been deleted or redirected to the wrong address. If this is going to be a problem, you can report it. We will try to solve this as soon as possible in order to serve you better.
404.explainErr: Briefly explain how you got the error.
404.explainErr2: We need to know this to better understand how you encountered the error you received.
404.noValue: No value can be entered in this field.

403.explain: Your transaction has caught on our firewall. You are trying to do something without being a member or your existing authorization has been taken. Or the link link you are trying to come here has expired. If you see this as a problem, you can let us know.
403.explainErr: Briefly explain how you got the error.
403.explainErr2: We need to know this to better understand how you encountered the error you received.
403.noValue: No value can be entered in this field.

verifyacc.succes: Your account has been successfully verified. After activating your account, you have stepped into a safer environment. Thank you.
verifyacc.errorMessage: In order to keep your account safer, the account verification link we sent to you seems to have reached its end of life. Please request an account reset link from settings again. Remember, if you don't verify your account within 30 minutes, you'll see this error again.

reset.strongpass: Secure your account with a strong password.
reset.uppercase: Password must be contain at least one uppercase character
reset.lowercase: Password must be contain at least one lowercase character
reset.number: Password must be contain at least one number
reset.successMessage: The password reset process has been updated successfully. You are redirected to the home page within 5 seconds.
reset.errorMessage: In order to keep your account safer, the password reset link we sent to you seems to have expired. Please request a password reset link again in settings. Remember, you will see this error again if you don't reset the password within 30 minutes.

searchtag.message: There is no article related to the subject tag you are trying to search.

welcome.aboutme: Welcome to my personal blog, where I will share with you the projects I have learned and developed, and at the same time tell about my experiences. You can subscribe to support me and sign up for my newsletter to be informed about my current articles. You can support just by reading my articles.
welcome.aboutme2: As you can see, I coded this blog myself. If you say how to code such a simple-based personal blog, you can read my series titled We Code Our Own Blog, which is a long article series I wrote. If you have questions, you can return to me by sending an e-mail or by answering what I wrote under my articles.

about.me: I am Fırat, I'm student at Beykent University at third class. I created this blog because I want to share what i learned. If you want to take my new articles, you can subscribe and support me easily. Have a good day !
